mapper.select: SELECT b.board2_no as board2_no, b.board2_title as board2_title, b.board2_content as board2_content, b.board2_regdate as board2_regdate, b.board2_isshow as board2_isshow, b.member_id as member_id FROM board2 as b INNER JOIN member as m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE b.board2_isshow='Y' AND m.member_type = '수강생' GROUP BY b.board2_regdate ORDER BY b.board2_no DESC;

SELECT b.board2_no as board2_no, b.board2_title as board2_title, b.board2_content as board2_content, b.board2_regdate as board2_regdate, b.board2_isshow as board2_isshow, b.member_id as member_id FROM board2 as b INNER JOIN member as m ON b.member_id = m.member_id WHERE b.board2_isshow='Y' AND m.member_type in ('강사님', '관리자') GROUP BY b.board2_regdate ORDER BY b.board2_no DESC;
SELECT board2_no, board2_title, board2_content, board2_regdate, board2_isshow, member_id FROM board2 WHERE board2_isshow='Y' ORDER BY board2_no DESC LIMIT 5;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board2(board2_title, board2_content, board2_regdate, board2_isshow, member_id) values(#{board2_title},#{board2_content},now(),'Y',#{member_id})
